remarks: Properties of a trail between two vertices.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Nov-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Alexander van der Vekens, 16-Dec-2017.)
statement: trlonprop $p |- ( F ( A ( V TrailOn E ) B ) P -> ( ( ( V e. _V /\ E e. _V ) /\ ( F e. _V /\ P e. _V ) /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) ) /\ ( F ( A ( V WalkOn E ) B ) P /\ F ( V Trails E ) P ) ) ) $.
